      • getServerHardwareJavaRemoteConsoleUrl

        public JavaRemoteConsoleUrlResult getServerHardwareJavaRemoteConsoleUrl(RestParams params,
                                                                        String resourceId)
        Description copied from interface: ServerHardwareClient
        This module aids in generating a Single Sign-On (SSO) session for the iLO Java Applet console and returns the URL to launch it. If the server hardware is unmanaged or unsupported, the resulting URL will not use SSO and the iLO Java Applet will prompt for credentials.

        Note: this is not supported on G7/iLO3 or earlier servers.

        Specified by:
        getServerHardwareJavaRemoteConsoleUrl in interface ServerHardwareClient
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        resourceId - The resource identifier for server hardware as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        JavaRemoteConsoleUrlResult containing the Java remote console URL details.

        Refreshes the server hardware to fix configuration issues.

      • getServerHardwareRemoteConsoleUrl

        public RemoteConsoleUrlResult getServerHardwareRemoteConsoleUrl(RestParams params,
                                                                String resourceId)
        Description copied from interface: ServerHardwareClient
        Generates a Single Sign-On (SSO) session for the iLO Integrated Remote Console Application (IRC) and returns the URL to launch it. If the server hardware is unmanaged or unsupported, the resulting URL will not use SSO and the IRC application will prompt for credentials. Use of this URL requires a previous installation of the iLO IRC and is supported only on Windows client.
        Specified by:
        getServerHardwareRemoteConsoleUrl in interface ServerHardwareClient
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        resourceId - The resource identifier for server hardware as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        RemoteConsoleUrlResult containing the remote console URL details.

      • getServerHardwareUtilization

        public UtilizationData getServerHardwareUtilization(RestParams params,
                                                    String resourceId)
        Description copied from interface: ServerHardwareClient
        This module aids in retrieving historical utilization data for the specified resource, metrics, and time span. Filters are not supported yet.
        Specified by:
        getServerHardwareUtilization in interface ServerHardwareClient
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        resourceId - The resource identifier for server hardware as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        UtilizationData containing the utilization data details.

      • getId

        public String getId(RestParams params,
                    String name)
        Description copied from interface: ServerHardwareClient
        The module aids in fetching the server hardware resource identifier for the server hardware name as specified in HPE OneView.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface ServerHardwareClient
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        name - The resourceName is the server hardware name as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        String which is the resource Id for the ServerHardware name as seen in HPE OneView.
